title: It’s Not Too Late to Meet Again After Rebirth - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Chefs   Cooking   Debts   Different Social Status   Doting Love Interests   Dreams   Familial Love   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Restaurant   Second Chance
author: 荷风渟
description:
Because of his illness Lin Mo broke up with his hidden scum lover after a long time. He didn’t understand why the one next to him in his last times was his worst enemy, who took him as a treasure.

After his death Lin Mo found that he was reborn and was determined to walk a different path from before, deterring the scum future lover and maybe if they met repaying his handsome enemy his gentle care.>
